ai-cp24:1.1_0: “May the Brahmā realm be fully understood
ai-cp24:1.2_0: made of the fine town of Kāsī.
ai-cp24:1.4_0: after being extinguished in the family.
ai-cp24:2.1_0: I used to be in the past
ai-cp24:2.3_0: When you saw the fear of fear,
ai-cp24:3.3_0: they invited me for sensual pleasures,
ai-cp24:4.1_0: When they spoke ill of them
ai-cp24:4.3_0: I used to be an act of wrong conduct,
ai-cp24:4.4_0: he has decided on the ground.
ai-cp24:5.1_0: Even those monks lifted me up
ai-cp24:5.2_0: and asked me for my almsbowl.
ai-cp24:6.2_0: wishing me well and wanting the best for me,
ai-cp24:7.3_0: That’s why the mother came here
ai-cp24:8.3_0: They’ve discarded the stain of stinginess,
